page.title: 11Transport
page.content: There is{no speed limit}in Rusper but they have signs up to say{"Please {drive slowly".}The main road through the village is used as an alternative route to Gatwick and London.{Car {parking}is a problem;The Star public house has a carpark which can be used if the owner says so,and there is a new carpark next to the church.Most of the newer private houses have garages,but the council property and older houses do not.The roads are busy at rush hour and mid-day.They are also narrow and badly lit.There is no bus stop in the village,but a {bus }which goes to Horsham,stops outside " The Plough".It runs twice a day.The nearest branchline station is at Faygate. It is difficult to travel unless you own a{private car}.In Rusper there is no longer a petrol station,only a repair garage.
